alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 8:48AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS... SOUTHEASTERN BEAUREGARD...CENTRAL CALCASIEU AND SOUTHWESTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 915 AM CST... At 847 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westlake, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Reeves, Moss Bluff, Ragley, Longville, Buhler, Topsy, Gillis, Leblanc, Buller, and Carlyss. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 13 and 34. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 7, and near mile marker 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu
